title: Intro-Medical Image Proc
description: A study of mathematical methods used in medical acquisition and processing.  Concepts, algorithms, and methods associated with acquisition, processing, and display of two- and three-dimensional medical images are studied.  Crosslisted with BMED 4783.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 2025 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2026 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
